page.title: 12Church Farm 1985 Kirmington
page.content: This year the farm of 345 acres is all Arable except 5 acres of Permanant grass. SUGAR BEET 63 acres VINING PEAS 55 acres WINTER WHEAT 116 acres WINTER BARLEY 56 acres SPRING WHEAT 30 acres LINSEED 20 acres for details of these crops see pages 4 to 9 in Melton Ross & Croxton. LINSEED : This is grown for the oil which is used as Linseed oil in paints and to make foam for fire extinguishers etc.. The crop is sown in early April and harvested late Aug. FIELD NAMES : Firth , Strips and Streams, The Moors,Town End,Johnsons Platt, Thorn Hills, Sykes, Horse Pasture Hill,Spur Platt, Clay Platt, Monument,Limber lane,30 acre and Longbottom.
